attributes.action: Bring in War time rationing to stop stock piling.
attributes.additional_details: Because of the selfish few a majority of us cannot get our shopping, the elderly and key workers have no chance. If we were all assigned one or two shops and a limit on what we could buy weekly this would be fairer.
attributes.background: Please bring in government controlled rationing while we are in the covid19 situation, to prevent all this stockpiling by selfish people.
